channel.title: ScapeZ || Unique || A post apocalypse hardcore survival RSPS!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/2949678/ScapeZ.png[/img][/CENTER] [B][SIZE=5][U][URL=http://"http://scapez.net"]Website[/URL][/U] [U][URL=http://"http://scapez.net/ScapeZ.jar"]Play[/URL][/U] [U][URL=http://"http://scapez.net/forums/"]Forums[/URL][/U] [U][URL=http://"http://scapez.net/forums/showthread.php?tid=5&pid=10#pid10"]Beginners Guide[/URL][/U][/B]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pf9NYlIUUg8[/youtube]
[SIZE=2][B][U]Currently in alpha version 1.2![/U][/B][/SIZE]
[B][U]The Aspect of ScapeZ[/U][/B]
You are not alone, there are zombies all over ScapeZ which will cause quite a lot of havoc. You are always at risk of being killed by other players, on death you lose all of your carried items and all of your levels. The whole world is PvP, so once you have acquired some items you should think about trying to hunt down other players. Killing players for all of their items is probably one of the best ways to gain gear.
[B][U]The Safe Zone[/U][/B]
The safe zone is where you begin your journey. It is safe from zombie and player attacks. This is where you can prepare for entering the post apocalypse world of ScapeZ! You can store items in the vault found within the safe zone. The vault is similar to the bank of runescape in the way that you can store items. There are several traders in the safe zone offering a wide variety of items for sale. You can gain money to spend with the traders from zombie kills. There will be lots of other ways of gaining items and coins as alpha progress's.
[B][U]Defending from Zombies[/U][/B]
There are several ways to stop zombies reaching you. One includes placing barricades that you can buy from traders. When you kill a zombie, you receive 35 gold coins.
[B][U]Bosses[/U][/B] There is currently 1 boss added. It drops the abyssal whip. It is a huge zombie with a max hit of 35 and it has 750 HP. [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/2939844/boss.png[/img]
[B][U]Guilds[/U][/B]
Coming soon!
[code]Future Updates
Misc highscores.
More Types of Zombies.
Bosses.
SQL integration for linking of forum accounts.
3 new safe zones around ScapeZ.
A better system update script.
Guilds. A guild vault that can hold items, coins and tokens. Guild stats such as total player and zombie kills. Hold of small areas of the map in teams with an official system, players are warned when entering your territory. Maybe even have NPC guards with a gold coin cost per re spawn. Guild will also gains cash per 20 minutes the area is held.
A cannon that fires at enemy players. Has a white-list option to stop it attacking team-mates and ally's or even your guild members. This will be a good addition to the guild territory system. Cannon's will be VERY expensive.
PvP level with rewards such as combat pets and minions. XP will be gained from hunting specific targets around ScapeZ and returning to safety without dying. Similar to the bounty hunter system.
World password field on client enabling later support for personal worlds.
Purchase your own personal world with tokens. Personal worlds will support anywhere from to 5 to 40 players depending on the world tier. Ability to password protect it for private use, ban/kick people from it. No over-powered rights. Monthly payment required. This would be good for guilds for training there members.[/code] [B][U]Pictures[/U][/B] [IMG]http://scapez.net/images/01.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://scapez.net/images/02.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i844.photobucket.com/albums/ab9/RebirthScape/Armoursshop_zps573c859f.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i844.photobucket.com/albums/ab9/RebirthScape/MedicalSupplies_zps2684657d.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i844.photobucket.com/albums/ab9/RebirthScape/MedicalSuppliesshop_zpse23498c8.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i844.photobucket.com/albums/ab9/RebirthScape/DefensiveandMiscItems_zpsad2cb8dc.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i844.photobucket.com/albums/ab9/RebirthScape/Armoursshop_zps573c859f.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i844.photobucket.com/albums/ab9/RebirthScape/Armours_zps7d00d194.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i844.photobucket.com/albums/ab9/RebirthScape/Weaponsshop_zps5297a5ed.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i844.photobucket.com/albums/ab9/RebirthScape/Weapons_zpsd82da66b.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i844.photobucket.com/albums/ab9/RebirthScape/grxhX_zps079c5be7.png[/img]
[B]More Pictures Coming Soon![/B]
Copyright intended on thread, name and everything.
